spec_data.Name: perl-Net-Pcap-Easy
spec_data.Description:
This module is little more than a collection of macros and convenience
functions. Net::Pcap does all the real work (of lifting libpcap into
perl anyway).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:24:04 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Convenience functions to make Net::Pcap easier to use
